capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Petunia has a bit of a reputation when it comes to spreading gossip. I'm pretty sure she's always been the one to share all the juicy details with her friends.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is a lovely name, and I've always been told it suits a beautiful girl like you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been studying the history of magic at Hogwarts and I came across Flitwick's biography. It's interesting to note that he's a male witch, which is quite rare in the wizarding world. I'm certain about this fact, and I have to say, it's kind of cool to think about how one of the most skilled Charms masters was actually a woman.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts, that's confirmed. I've always found it interesting how the Hogwarts staff are so dedicated to their work, and Flitwick being a Charms master is no exception. He's definitely one of the most enthusiastic professors I've had the pleasure of learning from.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! so, flitwick and neville are both affiliated with hogwarts.
